message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.rdf.api.Value' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverterRegistry'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.OrmException' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverterRegistry'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.Thing' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverterRegistry'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConversionException' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverterRegistry'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverter' import. Should be before 'com.mobi.rdf.orm.conversion.ValueConverterRegistry'.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.util.*.
Line continuation have incorrect indentation level, expected level should be 4.
